abstract: American skier Lindsey Vonn's victory in the giant slalom in Solden, Austria, makes her one of only five women to win a race in each of the five World Cup disciplines.
snippet: A victory in the giant slalom makes Vonn one of only five women to win a race in each of the five World Cup disciplines.
lead_paragraph: A victory in the giant slalom makes Vonn one of only five women to win a race in each of the five World Cup disciplines.

headline.main: Lindsey Vonn Wins Giant Slalom and Completes Sweep
headline.print_headline: Vonn Now A Winner In Every Aspect
headline.seo: Lindsey Vonn Wins Giant Slalom and Completes Sweep
